name: Circuitron
description: Circuitron is an oscilloscope-themed robot and a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red body and black screen, Circuitron stands out as a true technological marvel. Its retro console buttons and hand-down arms and legs give it a nostalgic charm, reminiscent of classic gaming consoles. Circuitron is always ready for action, equipped with its trusty red helmet addon that enhances its abilities and protects it during missions. With a perfect blend of style and functionality, Circuitron is an invaluable asset to the WebtrES club.
